@graph.headline: Want to Upsell on Shopify and Actually Make More Money?
@graph.description: Learn how to effectively upsell on Shopify by installing upsell apps, creating specific offers, and displaying them at optimal times to increase average order value and customer lifetime value.

@graph.name: How to Upsell on Shopify
@graph.description: Step-by-step guide to implementing upselling strategies on Shopify

supply.name: Upsell App from Shopify App Store

step.name: Install an Upsell App
step.text: First install an upsell app from the Shopify App Store. This is non-negotiable for effective upselling.

step.name: Create Specific Offers
step.text: Create actual offers that suggest a better, pricier product upgrade that provides clear value to customers.

step.name: Display Offers Strategically
step.text: Display these offers on product pages, in the cart, or at checkout for maximum visibility and conversion.

step.name: Implement Post-Purchase Upsells
step.text: Present post-purchase upsells on the thank you page for one-click acceptance with higher conversion rates.

hasDefinedTerm.name: Upselling
hasDefinedTerm.description: A sales strategy to get a customer to buy a more expensive version of something they're already looking at, focusing on upgrades within the same product category.

hasDefinedTerm.name: Cross-selling
hasDefinedTerm.description: A sales technique that recommends related or complementary items to go with the main purchase, expanding horizontally across product categories.

hasDefinedTerm.name: Down-selling
hasDefinedTerm.description: A sales strategy that offers a slightly cheaper, less featured alternative when a customer appears ready to abandon their purchase due to price concerns.

hasDefinedTerm.name: Average Order Value (AOV)
hasDefinedTerm.description: The average dollar amount spent each time a customer places an order, calculated by dividing total revenue by number of orders.

hasDefinedTerm.name: Customer Lifetime Value (CLV)
hasDefinedTerm.description: The total amount of money a customer is expected to spend with a business during their entire relationship.

hasDefinedTerm.name: Shopify
hasDefinedTerm.description: A multinational e-commerce platform that allows individuals and businesses to create their own online stores.

hasDefinedTerm.name: Shopify App Store
hasDefinedTerm.description: Shopify's marketplace for third-party applications that extend the functionality of Shopify stores.

hasDefinedTerm.name: Pre-purchase Upsells
hasDefinedTerm.description: Upsell offers shown to shoppers before they complete their purchase, typically on product pages, in cart, or during checkout.

hasDefinedTerm.name: Post-purchase Upsells
hasDefinedTerm.description: Upsell offers presented after a customer has completed their purchase, usually on thank you pages with one-click acceptance.
